subject: Re: [junit] Usage of JUnit with VAfJ
msgSnippet: For every package P I create a package P.test and place the tests there. This ensure that I never give in to the temptation of testing a
messageBody:
For every package P I create a package P.test and place the tests there.
This ensure that I never give in to the temptation of testing a
private/protected/package-level method.

J. B. Rainsberger <rainsber@...>

Subject: [junit] Usage of JUnit with VAfJ





Has someone an opinion on where to place the JUnit tests in Visual Age for
Java so they don't go away with the production code ?
_ New project(s) ?
_ New packages(s) ?

or simply specific names & removed them with a script ?

Tx,

thomas,
